It seems the level of Debate on this Elections section forum is very poor. 
 
 As an interested outsider of the Presidential election I would love to see a proper debate on the policies of both candidates but instead of this we see threads on the following
 
 You got to wonder about Obama - A thread about Hamas supporting Obama
 Elimination of Dissent - Obama supporters boo and jeer McCain supporters
 Troopergate keeps hurting - Another thread on the Palin scandal
 Pilate was a governor, Jesus a community organiser - A thread comparing Obama to Jesus
 
 These threads are from both right and left of American politics, and they don't actually address any of the issues that matter in the election. 
 
 Now I am not trying to say this is wrong but it brings up an interesting issue about this election. Are these thread just a reflection of the level of debate on this forum? Or is an indication of the general level debate in the US today?
The problem is, Obama is winning on the issues, as well as on his policies, and rightwing birdbrains are very afraid. This is a bunch of scared people whining.

The problem is, Obama is winning on the issues, as well as on his policies, and rightwing birdbrains are very afraid. This is a bunch of scared people whining.

 
 The problem is that the same people say the same thing over and over again.
 In the end they dont listen they just give stock insults back to insults recieved.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Debating the Policies
